column1: Kata Robata////Came here for happy hour on a weekday. The place is cute and cozy. It wasn't too busy
column2: so we didn't have to wait in line
column4: there's usually a long line for this place and you usually have to make reservations in advance to eat here for dinner. We sat at the sushi bar
column5: which is always fun. There's also a cute little garden patio with AC in the back of the restaurant.
